thread.title: The New Chewbacca Wrote a Lovely Letter to 'Star Wars' Fans
thread.title_full: The New Chewbacca Wrote a Lovely Letter to 'Star Wars' Fans

author: michelle@dailydot.com (Michelle Jaworski)
title: The New Chewbacca Wrote a Lovely Letter to 'Star Wars' Fans
text:
Screengrab via Star Wars/YouTube BTW 
The cast for the Han Solo movie has been confirmed as filming begins, and one of its new stars is paying homage to the legacy and impact his Star Wars character has made. 
Fans learned after the theatrical release of The Force Awakens that Peter Mayhew didn’t bring Chewbacca back to life alone. Now that Mayhew is older, a Finnish actor named Joonas Suotamo helped portray Chewbacca during many of the film’s action scenes . While fans already knew about the casting of Alden Ehrenreich and Donald Glover as Han Solo and Lando Calrissian , the announcement from Lucasfilm revealed that Suotamo would be taking over Chewbacca completely for this movie. 
After the news became public, Suotamo posted a touching note to Star Wars fans about what it meant for him to take up Chewbacca’s mantle. He particularly thanked Mayhew for the help and guidance he’s provided to help him prepare for the role. I'm ecstatic. It's official. And here is my statement to this terrific piece of news https://t.co/a1DPsNDb2P pic.twitter.com/r4EUZ2r17V — Joonas Suotamo (@JoonasSuotamo) February 21, 2017 “I aspire to make Peter proud and bring Star Wars fans the Chewie they know and love,” Suotamo wrote.
Considering many didn’t realize there were two Chewie’s in The Force Awakens , Suotamo will probably settle in as everyone’s favorite Wookiee just fine.
